sect1.title: Creating Shortcuts to Menu Commands
sect1.para: Many functions which are accessible via the main menu have a default keyboard shortcut. You may want to create a new shortcut for a command that you use a lot and doesn't have one or, more rarely, edit an existing shortcut.

step.para: The Keyboard Shortcuts Dialog can be used to assign keyboard shortcuts. Not only for menu commands, but also for any other command.
